<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
    // Ensure you target the correct links that are used for navigation (e.g., .nav-link)
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link'); 
    // Select all sections that have an ID and are used as scroll targets
    const sections = document.querySelectorAll('section[id]');
    const heroHeight = window.innerHeight;

  function toggleNavbarVisibility() {
        if (navbar) {
            if (window.scrollY >= heroHeight) {
                // Show navbar and fix position when past hero section
                navbar.style.display = 'flex';
                if (!navbar.classList.contains('fixed-top')) {
                    navbar.classList.add('fixed-top');
                }
            } else {
                // Hide navbar on hero section
                navbar.style.display = 'none';
                navbar.classList.remove('fixed-top');
            }
        }
    }

  function updateActiveNavLink() {
        let current = '';
        const scrollPosition = window.scrollY;

  sections.forEach(section => {
            const sectionTop = section.offsetTop;
            const sectionHeight = section.clientHeight;
            // Use a buffer (e.g., 200px) so the link activates slightly before the section hits the top
            if (scrollPosition >= sectionTop - 200 && scrollPosition < sectionTop + sectionHeight - 200) {
                current = section.getAttribute('id');
            }
        });

  navLinks.forEach(link => {
            link.classList.remove('active');
            
  if (link.getAttribute('href') && link.getAttribute('href').endsWith('#' + current)) {
                link.classList.add('active'); 
            }
        });
    }

  toggleNavbarVisibility();
  updateActiveNavLink();

  window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
        toggleNavbarVisibility();
        updateActiveNavLink();
    });

  document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link').forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            const href = this.getAttribute('href');
            if (href && href.startsWith('index.qmd#')) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const targetId = href.split('#')[1];
                document.getElementById(targetId).scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
                
  navLinks.forEach(l => l.classList.remove('active'));
                this.classList.add('active'); 
            }
        });
    });
});
</script>
